thread.title: Watch the teaser for Marvel's "Jessica Jones"
thread.title_full: Watch the teaser for Marvel's "Jessica Jones" - CBS News

author: Lauren Moraski CBS News
title: Watch the teaser for Marvel's "Jessica Jones"
text:
Netflix is out with the first trailer for "Jessica Jones," the upcoming Marvel series starring Krysten Ritter in the title role.
The show will follow Jessica Jones as she rebuilds her personal life and career as a private detective after a short-lived superhero stint. The 13-episode series follows Jessica as she takes on cases in the Hell's Kitchen neighborhood of New York City.
"I'm just trying to make a living. You know, booze costs money, usually," she says at the start of the teaser.
The cast also includes David Tennant (Kilgrave), Mike Colter (Luke Cage), Rachael Taylor (Trish Walker), Carrie-Anne Moss, Eka Darville, Erin Moriarty and Wil Traval, among others.
The series will premiere on Nov. 20, 2015.
